decodeCoreStateRegistryPayload(uint256).details: reads the payload from the core state registry and decodes it in a more detailed manner.

params.dstPayloadId_: is the unique identifier of the payload received in dst core state registry

returns.decodedDstPayload: is the details of the payload, refer DecodedDstPayload struct for info

decodeCoreStateRegistryPayloadLiqData(ui.details: reads the payload from the core state registry and decodes liqData for it (to be used in withdraw cases)

params.dstPayloadId_: is the unique identifier of the payload received in dst core state registry

returns.amountsIn: are the from amounts to the liquidity bridge
returns.bridgeIds: are the ids of the bridges to be used
returns.interimTokens: are the interim tokens to be used in the liqData
returns.liqDstChainIds: are the final destination chain id for the underlying token (can be arbitrary on withdraws)
returns.nativeAmounts: are the native amounts to be used in the liqData
returns.tokens: are the tokens to be used in the liqData
returns.txDatas: are the array of txData to be sent to the bridges

decodePayloadHistory(uint256).details: reads the payload header from superPositions and decodes it.

params.srcPayloadId_: is the unique identifier of the payload allocated by superform router

returns.callbackType: is the type of payload. check {CallbackType} enum in DataTypes.sol
returns.isMulti: indicates if the transaction involves operations to multiple vaults
returns.receiverAddressSP: is the address to be used for receiving Super Positions
returns.srcChainId: is the unique identifier of the srcChain
returns.srcSender: is the user who initiated the transaction on the srcChain
returns.txType: is the type of transaction. check {TransactionType} enum in DataTypes.sol

decodeTimeLockFailedPayload(uint256).details: returns decoded failed timelock form payloads

params.timelockPayloadId_: is the unique identifier of payload in timelock state registry
is the unique identifier of payload in timelock state registry

params.dstPayloadId_: is the unique identifier of payload in dst core state registry

returns._0: proof is the proof for the payload
